FLOW.COMMENT: Set global values for all <errorInfo> fields here

MAP.NAME: PARENT
MAP.COMMENT: Set global values for all <errorInfo> fields here

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: This sequence exits on SUCCESS and implements Try-Catch
This sequence exits on FAILURE and is the Try block

MAP.COMMENT: Set Action - Mapping the WorkOrderServiceOrder to SiebelMessage XML

Values.value: Mapping the WorkOrderServiceOrder to SiebelMessage XML

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: This sequence exits on DONE and is the Catch block

INVOKE.COMMENT: Build Error Message and Send it for Reporting

EXIT.COMMENT: Exit on error if you need to write to the webMethods server log in addition to the local repository
